name: Nannari sarabath
description: Nannari Sarbath is one of the refreshing drinks to relish every summer
directions: heat up the syrup and let it boil until it reaches a fine string of single thread consistency.
let it Cool down completely and add lemon juice
Transfer to a clean container and refrigerate it
take a serving glass add 120ml of water
Give a quick stir and serve chilled.
